original: a'arya da sha badzra p'a ni hri da ya /
analyzed: aarya da sha badzra pa ni hri da ya

original: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po /
analyzed: phag ba lag na rdo rje chu snying po

original: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgya dang byang chub sems dpa thams cad la phyag tshal lo

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
analyzed: di skad bdag gis thos ba dus gcig na

original: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med @341a *//
analyzed: joms ldan da nyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med

original: zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te; de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: zas sbyin gyi kun dga ra ba na bzhugs te; de nas joms ldan da kyis tshe dang ldan ba kun dga bo la bka stsal ba

original: rigs kyi bu'am; rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu'i ming shes sam /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu; rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje chu ming shes sam

original: gsang sngags shes pa de la byad kyis mi tshugs so; ;gnod sbyin dag rnam par 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsang sngags shes ba de la byad kyis mi tshugs so; ;gnod sbyin dag rnam ba tshe ba mi gyur ro

original: srin po rnams dang / lhag ma za ba rnams dang / bdug pa za ba rnams 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srin po rnams dang lhag ma za ba rnams dang bdug ba za ba rnams tshe ba mi gyur ro

original: phyis 'jog pa rnams kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byid jog ba rnams kyang gnod ba mi gyur ro

original: tadya th'a / au ki ri ma ki ri /
analyzed: tadya tha au ki ri ma ki ri

original: mi r'i tsa da sha pa ri /
analyzed: mi r tsa da sha ba ri

original: pra dha re; aa lam pha le /
analyzed: pra dha re; aa lam pha le

original: khu khu me ti ku me tu me /
analyzed: khu khu me ti ku me tu me

original: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po 'di dag la rtag tu bdag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur nas bdag gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa yang bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang /
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje chu po di dag la rtag tu bdag gi phyi bzhin du brang ba gyur nas bdag rnyid log ba dang myos ba dang rab tu myos ba yang bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyab ba dang

original: yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar byed par bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas gsol pa thob @341b cig /
analyzed: yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su skyong ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su gyur ba byed ba joms ldan da kyi gas gsol ba thob cig

original: rgyal ba khyu mchog dang / 'brog gnas dang / gang gnas dang / ldas rtsen dang / nor bu bzang po dang / grags pa bzang dang / lus ngan gyi bu mdzes byed dang / phreng ba mdzes dang / rgyal po chen po chos skyong rnam thos kyi bu ste /
analyzed: rgyal ba khyu mchog dang brog gnas dang gang gnas dang ldas rtsen dang nor bu bzang po dang grags ba bzang dang lus ngan gyi bu mdzes byed dang phreng ba mdzes dang rgyal po chen po chos skyong rnam thos kyi bu ste

original: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po 'di dag la rtag tu bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur nas bdag gnyid kyis log ba dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa na yang bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang /
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje chu po di dag la rtag tu bdag gi phyi bzhin brang ba gyur nas bdag rnyid kyis log ba dang myos ba dang rab tu myos ba na yang bsrung ba dang yongs su bskyab ba dang

original: yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar byed par bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas gsol ba thob cig /
analyzed: yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su skyong ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su gyur ba byed ba joms ldan da kyis gas gsol ba thob cig

original: gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig sv'ah'a; tadya th'a /
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi gzhi di rnams grub ba gyur cig svaha; tadya tha

original: sa ra sa ra ne sv'ah'a /
analyzed: sa ra sa ra ne svaha

original: de la lag na rdo rje bcu po 'di dag gi gsang sngags gzhi rnams ni /
analyzed: de la lag na rdo rje chu po di dag gi gsang sngags gzhi rnams ni

original: ba ri kri ta n'a sha ni /
analyzed: ba ri kri ta na sha ni

original: de la rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po de dag gi gsang sngags kyi gzhi dam pa ni /
analyzed: de la rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rje chu po de dag gi gsang sngags kyi gzhi dam ba ni

original: aa ke / pa ke lakshe sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aa ke ba ke lakshe svaha

original: pa ta ha ta ye sv'ah'a /
analyzed: ba ta ha ta ye svaha

original: na mo bha ga b'a to buddha sya siddhyantu mantra pa d'a:sv'ah'a /
analyzed: na mo bha ga ba to buddha sya siddhyantu mantra ba da:svaha

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: joms ldan da kyis de skad ces bka stsal nas tshe dang ldan ba kun dga bo dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar cha ba jig rten yi rang ste joms ldan da kyis gsungs ba la mngon ba bstod do

original: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po rdzogs so ////
analyzed: phag ba lag na rdo rje chu snying po rdzogs so

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ni mi tra dang / d'a na sh'i la dang / zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ni mi tra dang da na sh la dang ju chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sdes sgyur cing zhus te gtan la bebs ba
